summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing the City's execution of an Agreement and Quit Claim Deed between the City of Seattle and the State of Washington, providing for the exchange of certain City (Water Department) real property easement rights for certain easement rights granted by the State to property pertinent to the existing location of the City's Cedar River Pipeline 4 in conjunction with the State's construction of a highway (SR 515, Renton Vicinity: Carr Road to Grady Way), said easements located in Section 29, Township 23 North, Range 5 East, W.M., and authorizing the acceptance of said easement granted by the State for Water Utility purposes.
